# The `Trace` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A trace represents a plausible sequence of executed basic blocks that passes through the current basic block one. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A trace represents a plausible sequence of executed basic blocks that passes through the current basic block one.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinetracemetrics/trace">Trace</a> class serves as a handle to internal cached data structures.

Definition at line 272 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>.

### getInstrCycles() {#a42762e6eab1667bcecdb77017b790040}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>InstrCycles llvm::MachineTraceMetrics::Trace::getInstrCycles (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the depth and height of MI.

The depth is only valid for instructions in or above the trace center block. The height is only valid for instructions in or below the trace center block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h/#l00316">316</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getInstrSlack() {#a4c28dd8965fc19e15f0ed6c7be60acec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned MachineTraceMetrics::Trace::getInstrSlack (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI) const</>}>
Return the slack of MI.

This is the number of cycles MI can be delayed before the critical path becomes longer. MI must be an instruction in the trace center block.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h/#l00323">323</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#l01206">1206</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp">MachineTraceMetrics.cpp</a>.

### getPHIDepth() {#ad7ced8a37469610d46bf6b393953ae1f}

Return the Depth of a PHI instruction in a trace center block successor.

The PHI does not have to be part of the trace.

</MemberDefinition>

### getResourceDepth() {#ade9b053c3235bc1f054a7086bf1c5551}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned MachineTraceMetrics::Trace::getResourceDepth (bool Bottom) const">
Return the resource depth of the top/bottom of the trace center block.

When bottom is set include instructions in current block in estimate.

This is the number of cycles required to execute all instructions from the trace head to the trace center block. The resource depth only considers execution resources, it ignores data dependencies. When Bottom is set, instructions in the trace center block are included.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h/#l00294">294</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#l01229">1229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp">MachineTraceMetrics.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getResourceLength() {#a3bab5c2e4f0b9a464665f79677b7f7e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned MachineTraceMetrics::Trace::getResourceLength (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; Extrablocks=&#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedclassdesc">MCSchedClassDesc</a> &#42; &gt; ExtraInstrs=&#123;&#125;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedclassdesc">MCSchedClassDesc</a> &#42; &gt; RemoveInstrs=&#123;&#125;) const</>}>
Return the resource length of the trace.

This is the number of cycles required to execute the instructions in the trace if they were all independent, exposing the maximum instruction-level parallelism.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> blocks in Extrablocks are included as if they were part of the trace. Likewise, extra resources required by the specified scheduling classes are included. For the caller to account for extra machine instructions, it must first resolve each instruction&#39;s scheduling class.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h/#l00304">304</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#l01256">1256</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp">MachineTraceMetrics.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isDepInTrace() {#a5c87181311e69141665082e3fc53d801}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MachineTraceMetrics::Trace::isDepInTrace (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; DefMI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; UseMI) const</>}>
A dependence is useful if the basic block of the defining instruction is part of the trace of the user instruction.

It is assumed that DefMI dominates UseMI (see also isUsefulDominator).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h/#l00332">332</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinetracemetrics-h">MachineTraceMetrics.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp/#l01310">1310</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinetracemetrics-cpp">MachineTraceMetrics.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
